data.message: Our future  depends on your willingness to clean up; no more non recyclable plastic bottles please!

replies.message: Hi Evelyn, thanks for getting in touch. We’re proud to say that all of our bottles and cans in Great Britain are 100% recyclable and have been since 2012. This means that all our drinks packaging can be recycled at home or when you’re out and about.   We know sustainability, and recycling specifically, is a vital issue to address and that’s why we’re currently in the process of reviewing our sustainable packaging strategy which we will publish in the summer. To keep up to date, please head to: www.coca-cola.co.uk/sustainability-section
